PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-20082009-12-10,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY
ActTelecommunications Act
SubjectCRTC - Variation of Telecom Decision CRTC 2009-678
PrecisOrder that will vary Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (CRTC) Telecom Decision CRTC 2009-678 "Review of Globalive Wireless Management Corp. under the Canadian ownership and control regime", to allow Globalive, a Canadian-owned and controlled company, to enter the Canadian market as soon as possible. The variance will support the Government's stated objectives of futhering competition in the wireless market with the goal of lowering prices, providing better services and broader choice for consumers.
AttachmentsAttachment
